MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH4 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Comely Bank Road and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have manged to restore power to a number of properties in the area and we now expect your supply to be restored by 3.30AM. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.42AM on 23rd November 2020.
